__e: He said that last year you promised him that next year he could be George, but when it come to this year you denied last year had happened.
It was your district attorney that denied me furlough so I could visit my dying sister one last time, say goodbye to her in person.
So it's your testimony that the victim came into the precinct... to drop the charges and clear her husband but never refuted what happened, correct?
Why did you deny we were getting married back there?
Yeah, she denied that anything was going on between them, but...

And on the night of Mr. Fierstein's death, when she denied knowing he was in her building, when she neglected to mention she had performed oral sex on him on her rooftop shortly before he fell, is that also because she was afraid
Why did you deny me the chance to speak to my friends ?
I have done everything you've ever asked me to do and still you've denied me the only thing I ever wanted.
I mean, I think I've done a lot to help you, and you've refused to help yourself.
I talked to my son, and... he flew into a rage.
But what was also clear is that you denied everything.
I know the police couldn't find any proof of an affair or a secret meeting and that Turner just denied everything.
